component.name: VideoExample
component.script:
sub init() videocontent = createObject("RoSGNode", "ContentNode")
videocontent.title = "Example Video" videocontent.streamformat = "mp4" videocontent.url = "https://www.learningcontainer.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/sample-mp4-file.mp4" videocontent.playstart = 20
video = m.top.findNode("exampleVideo") video.content = videocontent
video.enableUI = false video.setFocus(true) video.control = "play" end sub
